SELECT a.id, a.message, a.user_name userName, CONVERT (a.create_time, CHAR) createTime, a.req_ip ip, a.real_path realPath, a.log_level logLevel FROM sys_work_log a INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM sys_work_log WHERE 1=1
AND user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
AND real_path LIKE '%${realPath}%'
ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT ${total}, ${limit} ) AS myNew USING (id)
